name: 王育慧
objective: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，如何與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場/消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。足夠的資金與完善的財務規劃乃創業者實現一切機會和理想的基礎。本課程教導學生熟悉及運用資產負債表、損益表與現金流量表妥善規劃創業財務管理。
schedule:
Week 1-2: Entrepreneurship thought & action (ET&A)
Week 3-4: value proposition, revenue model, business canvas
Week 5-6: building Entrepreneurship team
Week 7-8: Design thinking
Week 9-10: The basics of Entrepreneurship Finance
Week 11-12:opportunity evaluation, business tests, failure & acceptance
Week 13: family business
Week 14: crowd funding  
Week 15: Lecture
Week 16: Entrepreneurship financing from V.C. and Angel
Week 17: Rocket Pitch 1
Week 18: Rocket Pitch 2
scorePolicy:
Final Project 40%
Homework and Casework 30%
Class Participation 30%

期末專題報告 40%
作業與案例研討 30%
課程參與40%
materials:
Text book: 
1.　　創新創業教戰手冊, Steve Blank, Bob Dorf著, 何建德等譯, 華泰文化。
2.　　創業管理, William Bygrave, Andrew Zacharakis著, 陳明惠審訂, 華泰文化。
